channel.title: Easy question just need a little help :)
channel.description:
im running a server called d4gg4rscape and its based on ricscape source... training lvls is fast and quick but the max lvls 99 in wildy which can be a pain.. the reason im saying this is because because of the str bonus on items its possible to hit about 80.. how can i change the max hp level for EVERYBODY to be about 200 or what evers possible cause it would make things much simpler... thanks for your help
~Jack Dennis~

item.title: Easy question just need a little help :)
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

he does it again waffles fixed it!

Read full topic
item.source: Easy question just need a little help :)

item.title: Easy question just need a little help :)
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

If (playerLevel[0] > 135) {
playerLevel[0] = 135;
}

For all skills except hp.

if (playerLevel[3] > 200) {
playerLevel[3] = 200;
}

Change the max xp for lvl 200, and the max lvl to 200.

Read full topic
